name: Borealis plus OS
description:
usually the operating system is the computer, but now, you can use a operating system within an operating system! explore the new operating system Borealis plus, with all the new tech from 1998, and all of the high, quality games and tools you can imagine, including:

-pong

-breakout

-a calculator

-a calendar

-a virtual piano

-a fun maze game

and much more!

[please ignore any glitches or strange messages threatening the lives of you or loved ones, these are simply bugs in the code, no need to worry! just stay still and look at your screen. and no need to turn around.]
